info.title: Webhood - v1 API
info.description: This is the OpenAPI 3.1.0 schema for the Webhood URL scanner API

externalDocs.description: Find out more about Webhood URL Scanner

post.description: Create a new scan to be initiated by the scanner

requestBody.description: Create a new scan to be initiated by the scanner

400.description: Something went wrong while processing your request

401.description: The request requires valid record authorization token to be set

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort scans by field. Prefix with '-' to sort in descending order

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of scans returned

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset for the scans returned. For example, if you want to skip the first 10 scans, set offset to 10

400.description: Something went wrong while processing your request

401.description: The request requires valid record authorization token to be set
The request requires valid record authorization token to be set

get.description: Returns a screenshot of a successful scan

401.description: The request requires valid record authorization token to be set

get.description: Returns the trace of a successful scan

401.description: The request requires valid record authorization token to be set

404.description: Trace not found in the scan

get.summary: Get HTML content by scan ID
get.description: Returns the HTML of a successful scan

401.description: The request requires valid record authorization token to be set

404.description: HTML not found in the scan

connectStart.description: Started connecting to the remote host.

pushEnd.description: Time the server finished pushing request.

pushStart.description: Time the server started pushing request.

requestTime.description:
Timing's requestTime is a baseline in seconds, while the other numbers are ticks in
milliseconds relatively to this requestTime.

created.description: Date and time when the scan was created

updated.description: Date and time when the scan was last updated

done_at.description: Date and time when the scan was completed

slug.description: Unique identifier for the scan that can be used to generate a link to the scan

final_url.description: URL that was scanned after redirects

screenshots.description: Identifiers for files containing the screenshots

items.description: Identifier for files containing the screenshots

html.description: identifiers for other files gathered during the scan

items.description: Identifier for other files gathered during the scan

errorMessage.description: Description of what error occurred during the scan if the scan did not finish successfully
examples: Error while getting final url, url might be invalid. Final URL was: chrome-error://chromewebdata/

scanData.description: Data about the target of the scan
